statements: SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_location FROM patients;
SELECT patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_location FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_location = 'New York' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 AND patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, patient_location FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Non-binary' ORDER BY patient_name, patient_location;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, AVG(patient_age) AS average_age FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE appointment_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, doctor_name FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever' AND appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, prescription FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE doctor_name LIKE 'Dr. A%' ORDER BY prescription ASC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, location, age FROM Patients ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM Patients JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM Resources WHERE quantity <= 10;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, location FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE condition = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, location FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT condition, treatment, doctor FROM HealthRecords WHERE doctor LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT resource_name, quantity, location FROM Resources WHERE quantity > 10 AND location = 'Hospital A';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, address FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM LabResults WHERE test_name = 'Blood Test';
SELECT result_id, patient_id, test_name, result, date FROM LabResults WHERE result = 'Negative';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT plan_id, department, required_staff FROM ResourcePlanning WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY plan_id ASC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, LabResults.test_name, LabResults.result FROM Patients JOIN LabResults ON Patients.patient_id = LabResults.patient_id ORDER BY Patients.patient_name ASC, LabResults.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT diagnosis, doctor_name FROM HealthRecords WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT facility_name, type FROM MedicalFacilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC
SELECT study_name, researcher_name, start_date FROM ResearchStudies ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC,  patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, gender, location FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19'
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND gender='Female'
SELECT date, doctor_name, prescription FROM HealthRecords JOIN Patients ON HealthRecords.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE diagnosis='Hypertension' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT facility_name, type, capacity FROM MedicalFacilities WHERE capacity > 50
